jobDescription: THE COMPANY: JUUL's mission is to improve the lives of the worlds one billion adult smokers by driving innovation to eliminate cigarettes. JUUL is the number one US-based independent e-cigarette, selling over four million JUULpods per month. Headquartered in San Francisco and backed by leading technology investors including Tiger Global, Fidelity Investments and Tao Invest LLC, JUUL Labs is disrupting one of the worlds largest and oldest industries.  Were an exceptional team with backgrounds in technology, healthcare and biotech, and were growing rapidly to deliver on our mission. Were actively looking to hire the worlds best scientists, engineers, designers, product managers, supply chain experts, customer service and business professionals. ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES: The Business Intelligence / Data Analyst will be responsible for performing complex financial and operational analysis to support the Supply Chain Organization in meeting strategic business objectives. This position will report to the Director of Strategic Sourcing within the Supply Chain Organization.
